DataElement.preferredDefinition: Numeric value that represents the month that the patient's ability to perform ordinary tasks and carry out daily activities was assessed.

DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: The final result of a determination of  how well a patient is able to perform ordinary tasks and carry out daily activities.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: A measure of how well a patient is able to perform ordinary tasks and carry out daily activities.

Concepts.definition: A measure of how well a patient is able to perform ordinary tasks and carry out daily activities.

Property.preferredDefinition: Having determined the value, significance, or extent of.

Concepts.definition: The final result of a determination of the value, significance, or extent of.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: evaluations of the patient and the patient's disease.

DataElementConcept.changeDescription: Compound object class with addition of assessment property. 02/22/2013 - tc - Removed retired concept C25367 and replaced with C25217.

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: Event; something that happens at a given place and time._One of the 12 divisions of a year as determined by a calendar.  It corresponds to the unit of time of approximately to one cycle of the moon's phases, about 30 days or 4 weeks._A numeral or string of numerals expressing value, quantity, or identification.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: One of ten equal parts; a quantity corresponding to one tenth of the whole.: A list or register of events; a tabular array of the days.: One of the 12 divisions of a year as determined by a calendar.  It corresponds to the unit of time of approximately to one cycle of the moon's phases, about 30 days or 4 weeks.

Concepts.definition: One of ten equal parts; a quantity corresponding to one tenth of the whole.
A list or register of events; a tabular array of the days.
One of the 12 divisions of a year as determined by a calendar. It corresponds to the unit of time of approximately to one cycle of the moon's phases, about 30 days or 4 weeks.
